name: Clear Complete Soft Care Shampoo
description: Do the urban environmental pollutants damage your hair and scalp? Daily exposure to UV and pollution can damage your hair and scalp and may result in dandruff. CLEAR Complete Care Shampoo infused with Amino Acids helps to remove dandruff and deeply nourish your scalp and gives you healthy looking, beautiful hair. CLEAR shampoos are formulated with Triple Anti-Dandruff Technology to that help remove, resist and prevent dandruff.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
